name: A Long Way Home (itch) (SleepyDen)
description:
CREATED BY SLEEPY DEN FOR THE ITCH.IO MINI GAME JAM - UFO

A small kitty needs your help to power her spaceship! For whatever reason, it's powered solely by tuna cans... And the asteroids around the station she departed from are filled with them! Help her get home to her owner before bedtime!

// THIS GAME CONTAINS ALLUSIONS TO DEATH AND LONELY PETS, DON'T PLAY IF THESE CONCEPTS DISTURB YOU. //
